body:
Hi Mostapha, After I updated the Ladybug and Honeybee to the newest version, the "Ladybug_Ladybug" component turned red with the following information in the image. Is there anything wrong with my Ladybug and how can I get rid of this? Thank you in advance![
](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9677Xpk6OnVAy58YxjR5GFprEyEODLJoo2I2jVFQfFOmc5tSXx7XP6ZmFttKxsUlmQzMD1kf*uoOvEwdAJpYd5PK3eYIbD0E/QQ20140811141432.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9677Xpk6OnVbT8k-nYUsK4Mz4IausbZrYxcPS3J*j7hmabuYVK*q-5dsSJ4fm1yyfRYUVbyvJCiPb*2WzY2YpzJ1HPc0PmGP/QQ20140811143054.jpg)
topic: "Ladybug_Ladybug" component update problem - 'LightException' object has no attribute 'components'
